name: Puppet-lumberjack
tagline: Puppet module to manage Lumberjack, a lightweight Logstash shipper.
body:
# Puppet Lumberjack

## Build status

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/arioch/puppet-lumberjack.png?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/arioch/puppet-lumberjack)


## Example usage

### Install lumberjack

    node /box/ {
      include lumberjack
    }

### Configure lumberjack

    node /box/ {
      class { 'lumberjack':
        host        => '127.0.0.1',
        port        => 5000,
        window_size => 1024,
        logs        => [ '/var/log/*', '/var/log/*/*' ],
      }
    }
